statements: SELECT * FROM EdTechData WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM EdTechData WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM EdTechData ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EdTechData WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM EdTechData ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM EdTechData WHERE course_id = 1 AND completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, student_name FROM EdTechData WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name FROM EdTechData WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY course_name ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EdTechData WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM EdTechData WHERE completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level='10th';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, total_students FROM Courses ORDER BY total_students DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age >= 18 AND grade_level = 'Senior'
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students, Courses WHERE Students.student_id = 1 AND Courses.instructor = 'John Doe'
SELECT student_name, course_id, total_students FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.total_students
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, age FROM students WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT course_name, instructor, level FROM courses WHERE level='Intermediate';
SELECT name, age, class FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT name, gender FROM students WHERE class='10th Grade' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, level FROM courses WHERE level='Intermediate' ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.id = g.student_id JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.course_id WHERE g.grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE gender='Female' AND class='12th Grade';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT course_name, assessment_date, total_marks FROM Courses JOIN Assessments ON Courses.course_id = Assessments.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, count(student_id) as total_students FROM Courses LEFT JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Assessments.obtained_marks FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Assessments ON Enrollments.student_id = Assessments.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Assessments.course_id;
SELECT MAX(total_marks) AS highest_marks, MIN(total_marks) AS lowest_marks, AVG(total_marks) AS average_marks FROM Assessments GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, major, age FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Courses ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE course_id = 101 AND grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, age, gender, major FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT course_name, department, course_level FROM Courses WHERE course_level='Intermediate' ORDER BY department, course_name

SELECT student_name, major, grade, assessment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Assessments ON Enrollments.course_id = Assessments.course_id WHERE grade='A' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Assessments.assessment_name, Grades.score FROM Students, Courses, Assessments, Grades WHERE Students.student_id = Grades.student_id AND Assessments.assessment_id = Grades.assessment_id ORDER BY Courses.course_name ASC

SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_students DESC
